cont.entity_a: 6MP resolution is small by today's standards.
cont.entity_b: 12.8 MP resolution provides excellent image quality and dynamic range.

cont.entity_a: Provides higher quality results than the Kodak P850 it replaced. Offers excellent picture quality, better than Kodak point and shoot. Excellent outdoor and good indoor results.
cont.entity_b: Full-frame sensor enhances picture quality compared to crop sensors. Lacks modern features but still delivers stunning image quality. Delivers beautiful colors and textures.

cont.entity_a: Built-in anti-shake is a superior feature for most users, eliminating the need for expensive lenses. Features are comparable to Nikon and Canon at a lower cost. Shake reduction feature is effective. Great image stabilization and fast auto-focus. Indoor white balance requires adjustment. Limited buffer size for consecutive shots. Does not include a memory card. Affordable entry-level DSLR with built-in shake reduction. User-friendly for beginners.
cont.entity_b: Not as feature-rich as newer models but offers consistent quality. Requires a CF card for use. Older model but still a valuable tool for photographers.

Compatibility.comm: Compatible with a wide range of lenses.

cont.entity_a: Compatible with older K lenses, but they need electronic dots to work. Compatible with a wide range of Pentax lenses.
cont.entity_b: Works well with a wide range of lenses. Compatible with a wide selection of accessories.

cont.entity_a: Affordable entry-level DSLR with built-in shake reduction.
cont.entity_b: Affordable for those seeking full-frame capabilities.

cont.entity_a: Performs flawlessly. Durable and easy to use, lasting many years.
cont.entity_b: Solid construction and reliable performance. Good low-light performance up to ISO 800.

cont.entity_a: The 18-55mm kit lens offers surprising quality for little cost.
cont.entity_b: The viewfinder is large and fully utilizes wide lenses.

cont.entity_a: Some units have battery recognition issues with standard AA batteries. The camera has a loud shutter sound.
cont.entity_b: Some units may have battery life issues. Some units may have issues with the mirror or sensor.
Great for landscapes, portraits, and general photography. Great for street photography and studio portraits. A good choice for serious amateurs and professionals.

cont.entity_a: The camera is small enough for travel yet offers more control than digital devices.
